verses.text: The Spirit in our hearts Is whispering, Sinner, come; And Jesus calls, with sweetest voice, To all his children, Come!
Let him that heareth say To all about him, Come; And let the thirsting, consciencous, To Christ, the fountain, come!
Yes, whosoever will, O let him freely come, And freely drink the stream of life; 'Tis Jesus bids him come.
Lo! Jesus, who invites, Declares, I quickly come; Lord, even so, we wait thy hour; O blest Redeemer, come.
